tender.title: Demolishing of Existing OPD Bldg and Dialysis Bldg Group A in the campus of SMKCH Nalbari and disposal of Debris and Salvage materials inside the SMKCH Campus at designed space bldg for construction of Cancer Hospital at SMKCH Nalbari Campus
